title: disgustingly bad client
body: fed up with this disgustingly terrible client. Two games i have been kicked out and refused to join. please fix the client instead of making other sh*t look 'nice'.

replies.body: The new client is still in beta. You should have expected there to be issues and bugs.
Which client are you having trouble with? If it's the new one then you really ought to [switch back to the old client](http://i.imgur.com/Bzq7rPF.png).
